heroSection.heading: Find your dream property effortlessly with
heroSection.description: Apni Estate simplifies your property search with fast and reliable service.

serviceSection.heading: Our Services
serviceSection.description: We are dedicated to offering outstanding real estate services with a variety of benefits that elevate your experience. Discover why we are the top choice for your property needs.

bestPrice.title: Best Price
bestPrice.content: We offer the most competitive prices in the market, ensuring that you get the best deal for your budget. Whether you're buying or selling, our team will negotiate the best terms for you.

expertAdvice.title: Expert Advice
expertAdvice.content: Our team consists of experienced real estate agents who are ready to guide you through every step of your property journey, from finding the right location to finalizing the deal.

personalizedService.title: Personalized Service
personalizedService.content: We customize our services to fit your individual needs, making sure your experience with us is smooth and effortless. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.content: We offer round-the-clock support to assist you with any questions or issues. Whether you need advice on properties or help with paperwork, our team is always available to assist.

browsePropertySection.title: Browse Properties
browsePropertySection.description: Explore our diverse selection of properties and find the perfect home that suits your needs. Whether you're looking for a cozy apartment or a spacious house, we have options for every taste and budget. Start browsing now to discover your ideal property.

contactUsSection.title: Finding your perfect property is just a click away!
contactUsSection.description: Start browsing our property listings today and take the first step towards making your homeownership dreams a reality.

notfound.title: Oops! Data Missing
notfound.description: We couldn't find what you're looking for. Please double-check your request or try again soon!

agentsPage.title: Our Agents
agentsPage.description: Meet our team of dedicated professionals ready to help you find your dream property. With extensive expertise and deep market knowledge, we are committed to providing the best service for your needs.

favoritesPage.title: Your Favorite Properties
favoritesPage.description: Explore your list of favorite properties you've saved. Find the ones that best match your needs and preferences, ready for the next step.

myProperties.title: My Properties
myProperties.noProperties: You haven't added any properties yet.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.description: Comprehensive real estate solutions tailored to your needs. From construction to legal services, we've got you covered.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Explore our properties or request a service today and let us help you achieve your real estate goals.

construction.title: Construction Services
construction.subtitle: Build Your Dream Property
construction.description: Professional project management and execution for residential and commercial properties.
construction.fullDescription: Transform your vision into reality with our comprehensive construction services. We handle everything from planning and design to execution and handover, ensuring quality construction that meets international standards.

features.1: End-to-end project management from planning to completion
features.3: Timely delivery with transparent cost structure

interior-design.title: Interior Design
interior-design.subtitle: Create Beautiful Spaces
interior-design.description: Customized home and office interior design services.
interior-design.fullDescription: Our expert interior designers will transform your space into a beautiful and functional environment. We offer personalized design solutions that reflect your style and meet your needs.

features.1: Custom design concepts tailored to your taste

legal.title: Legal Services
legal.subtitle: Property Legal Support
legal.description: Expert legal assistance for all property matters.
legal.fullDescription: Navigate property transactions with confidence. Our legal experts provide comprehensive support for documentation, verification, and all legal aspects of property dealings.

vastu.title: Vastu Consultation
vastu.subtitle: Harmonize Your Space
vastu.description: Expert Vastu guidance for homes and offices.
vastu.fullDescription: Enhance positive energy in your property with Vastu consultation from certified experts. Get personalized recommendations for optimal placement and design.

features.1: Detailed Vastu analysis of your property

consulting.title: Construction Consulting
consulting.subtitle: Technical Expertise
consulting.fullDescription: Get expert advice on construction projects. Our consultants provide technical guidance, quality assurance, and structural assessments to ensure your project's success.

home-loan.title: Home Loans
home-loan.subtitle: Financial Assistance
home-loan.description: Home loan assistance with complete documentation support.
home-loan.fullDescription: Make your dream home affordable with our home loan services. We help you secure the best loan deals with minimal paperwork and hassle-free processing.

features.1: Competitive interest rates from multiple banks

materials.title: Construction Materials
materials.subtitle: Quality Materials
materials.description: Premium construction materials at competitive rates.
materials.fullDescription: Source high-quality construction materials at the best prices. We have partnerships with leading suppliers to provide you with genuine materials for your project.

features.1: Wide range of quality construction materials

serviceDetails.requestDescription: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you within 24-48 hours.

serviceForm.name: Full Name
serviceForm.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project requirements...
serviceForm.success: Request submitted successfully! We'll contact you soon.
serviceForm.error: Failed to submit request. Please try again.

registration.title: Join as a Professional
registration.description: Register as a professional service provider and connect with clients looking for your expertise. All registrations are reviewed by our team to ensure quality service.
registration.approvalNotice: All registrations require admin approval. You'll receive an email once your KYC verification is complete.
registration.formDescription: Please fill out all required fields carefully. Your application will be reviewed by our team within 24-48 hours.

interior-designer.title: Interior Designer
interior-designer.description: Creative interior design and space planning

form.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters long
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your expertise, specializations, and what makes you unique...
form.portfolioHint: Upload images of your previous work to showcase your expertise (optional)
form.documentsHint: Upload certificates, licenses, or other relevant documents (optional)
form.termsNotice: By submitting this form, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Your information will be reviewed by our team.
